segments.text: Peeking into the kitchen, I observe the everyday setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces the sink, towel in hand on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's on, basin full, water starting to spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It flows down the front, pooling on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepped into it without a glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the two-step stool, arm extended to the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, clever but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, palm up in expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window reveals a neat garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back, light pouring in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a snapshot of routine with hidden edges.
segments.speaker: PAR
